name: QRY_SUGGESTION_INFO
description: This table extracts the suggested diagnosis code and the text description of the diagnosis suggestion for a query.

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SUGGESTION_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the suggested code.

columns.name: SUGGESTION_SNOMED_ID_NAME
columns.description: The SmartData element name, such as "A Family History of Sickle Cell Anemia".

columns.name: SUGGESTION_TEXT
columns.description: The text prompt of the suggestion.

columns.name: SUGGESTION_SELECT_YN
columns.description: Whether the suggestion has been selected by the physician.

columns.name: QUERY_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.
